pkgmetadata.longdescription: # annual-daylightAnnual daylight recipe for PollinationUse this recipe to calculate annual daylight for a HBJSON model.This recipe uses an enhanced 2-phase method for daylight simulation with accurate direct sunlight calculation.For more information [see the recipe on Pollination](https://app.pollination.cloud/recipes/ladybug-tools/annual-daylight).
